content: साधु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (धु or ध्वी {%<ab>f.</ab>%}; <ab>compar.</ab> साधीयस्; <ab>superl.</ab> साधिष्ठ) [साध्-उन्] {@--1@} Good, excellent, perfect; यद्यत्साधु न चित्रे स्याक्त्रियते तत्तदन्यथा <ls>Ś. 6. 13</ls>; आपरितोषाद्विदुषां न साधु मन्ये प्रयोगविज्ञानं <ls n="Ś.">1. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Fit, proper, right; as in साधुवृत्त, साधुसमाचार. {@--3@} Virtuous, righteous, honourable, pious. {@--4@} ({%a%}) Kind, well-disposed; <ls>R. 2. 28</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 247.</ls> ({%b%}) Well-behaved (with <ab>loc.</ab>); मातरि साधुः <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--5@} Correct, pure, classical (as language). {@--6@} Pleasing, agreeable, pleasant; अतोऽर्हसि क्षंतुमसाधु साधु वा <ls>Ki. 1. 4.</ls> {@--7@} Noble, well-born, of noble descent. --धुः {@--1@} A good or virtuous man; <ls>R. 13. 65</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 62</ls>; <ls>Me. 80.</ls> {@--2@} A sage, saint; साधोः प्रकोपितस्यापि मनो नायाति विक्रियां <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--3@} A merchant; <ls>H. 2. 73.</ls> {@--4@} A Jaina saint. {@--5@} A usurer, money-lender. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Well, welldone, very nice, bravo; साधु गीतं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; साधु रे पिंगल वानर साधु <ls>M. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Enough, away with.
